idea: Shiplyst is a vendor agnostic freight marketplace and shipment management platform. It allows the customers to instantly compare freight from one or more vendors, benchmark freight contracts, book and manage freight shipments, track containers from pick up to delivery as well as collaborate with all stakeholders during the execution of the shipment.
name: SHIPLYST SYSTEMS PRIVATE LIMITED
EVEN KEEL LEARNING SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Flipspaces is a Virtual-Reality-Tech-based design and contracting venture that aims at disrupting the way consumers design and execute the interiors of their spaces. Powered by VR , Flipspaces also comes as a one stop solution for stakeholders looking for solutions ranging from SPACE DISCOVERY to DESIGN & BUILD.
name: FLIPSPACES TECHNOLOGY LABS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Avananta Innovations Pvt. Ltd. provides AI Solutions for enterprises. We have developed an unique, futuristic AI based voice solution for application across sectors and industries to facilitate customer interactions and service. Unlike a typical bot which is a mere one way instructional monologue, our AI technology provides a life-like two way conversational dialogue with customers to provide service, address their queries and provide solutions.  Our solution is also unique since it has been developed to cater to the Indian markets where diverse languages, dialects and pronunciations abound.
name: AVANANTA INNOVATIONS PRIVATE LIMITED
